Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the overall progress of the prototype development. Prepare for the daily stand-up meeting.
Daily stand-up meeting with the team. Review progress, address any remaining roadblocks, and coordinate tasks for the final day of the week.
Conduct a final playtest of the prototype, focusing on the overall experience and identifying any critical issues that need to be addressed before the end of the week.
Address the most critical issues identified during the final playtest. Prioritize these issues based on their impact on the gameplay and feasibility of implementation within the remaining time.
Communicate any remaining bugs or issues to the team and create tickets so that they can address them next week.
Prepare a demonstration or presentation of the prototype to showcase the progress made during the week. Invite key stakeholders to provide feedback.
Present the prototype to key stakeholders. Gather feedback and answer any questions they may have. @Ldes-1, @Lpro-1
Thank the team members for hard work during the week and provide them with encouragements. Make preparations for the follow-up work next week.
Update the project management software with the final progress of the prototype development. Write a summary report of accomplishments.
Complete the timesheet and shut down the computer. Ready for the weekends.
